title: The Great Brain Picker-Upper: A Book on Finding Happiness Every Day
description: An illustrated odyssey that discovers ways to find happiness in simple terms and with fun illustrations, this visionary book cannot be read and put away. Rather, you'll want to read it cover-to-cover and then keep it at close hand for a delicious dose of optimism. There's something in The Great Brain Picker-Upper for everybody. It's like daily therapy for the mind and soul.
author: Steve Kapelonis
